name: Tonkatsu Sauce (Japanese-Style Barbecue Sauce)
description: For what tastes like a complex sauce, the thick, sweet, and salty tonkatsu sauce is incredibly easy to throw together to go along with your fried golden and crispy panko-crusted cutlets.

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, stir together ketchup, Worcestershire, soy sauce, mirin, sugar, mustard, and garlic powder. Use immediately or store in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to a month.
